mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loster (loster_uuid, loster_name, age, loster_birthday, gender, height, lost_date, picture, lost_location, remarks, datasource, source_id, update_time) VALUES (#{losterUuid}, #{losterName}, #{age}, #{losterBirthday}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{lostDate}, #{picture}, #{lostLocation}, #{remarks}, #{datasource}, #{sourceId}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT loster_uuid, loster_name, picture, remarks FROM loster WHERE source_id = #{sourceId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM loster WHERE loster_uuid = #{losterUuid} AND source_id = #{sourceId};
